item.title: A lvl up porblem
item.dc:creator: @rob014 rob014
item.description:
@rob014 wrote:

Ok when you lvl up on defance you seem to get a skill cape every time dunno why.

ok this code shud be all right i have chakced it over and over please see if i done any thing wrongâ€¦

heres my code i got.

case 2: // Defence sendFrame164(6253); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); if (playerLevel[skill] == 99) { sendMessage("Congratulations with your lvl 99, here your skillcape!"); addItem(14079, 1); addItem(14080, 1); addItem(14081, 1); } NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

i got my att and other lvls the kinda the same as that just chnaged some of the numbers to make it give a cape when you get 99att

any help will be welcome thanks

-rob
